item.title: iFixit: the Switch 2 Pro is a ‘piss-poor excuse for a controller’
item.description: iFixit has shared a full teardown video of the Switch 2 Pro controller and is not impressed by how difficult it is to access the $85 accessory’s internal components, including its rechargeable battery

item.title: The best Prime Day deals on games, hardware, and accessories
item.description: The final day of Amazon’s Prime Day is the your last chance to score incredible deals on games to fill your backlog, as well as essential accessories like controllers, headsets, and storage expansion
